thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Nice and Very Clean
thread.title_full: Very Nice and Very Clean - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: merredethm
title: Very Nice and Very Clean
text: This hotel is great and the staff is very friendly. It's outside of San Francisco and very quiet and clean. My room was great and very clean. They have a kitchen with a mid-size fridge, full-size microwave, dishwasher, cabinets and even plates and utensils. The stovetop is a plus for me because I work out of town a lot and get tired of eating out, I'd rather cook a meal and enjoy it. The price is great for what you get and the free hot breakfast is a plus as well.
